title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Mathematics Teacher Professional Development Using Integrated Learning Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participating teachers can design three or more math curriculum-based ICT-collaborative learning modules using integrated learning design tools
Learners can systematically implement key phases of math instruction (goal setting-activity organization-assessment integration) through learning design tools
Learners can execute one or more actual math classes based on mobile-created learning designs and analyze formative assessment data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
